channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter and leaves, 16th November
item.description:
Wet leaves which are slippery when walked over, and litter, abandoned barrier in the alley been there since the summer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, St Paul's Wood Hill, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stretch of Road does not get swept, 16th November
item.description:
This stretch of from 54 North Cray Road up to dual carriageway roundabout does not get swept. Leaves on pavement by bus stop are slippery and leaves are covering the drains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68, North Cray Road, Bexley, Foots Cray, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: West end lane, 16th November
item.description:
This road is permanently gridlocked in all directions. There is a 4 way temporary traffic light system which does not work efficiently. The pelican crossing next to Ladbrokes id still in operation and stops traffic in all directions into the works. In addition the bus stope outside West Hampstead Tube and Thameslink are still operating causing further chaos. In addition nobody is working on this site at the weekend. Please review the situation and have a little respect for road users.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 203, West End Lane, West Hampstead, Hampstead, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped black rubbish bags, 16th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Widmore, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Extensive litter, 16th November
item.description:
This section of the common has been neglected for months. Bottles, cans everywhere, a dumped bed base has been there for months, cans in and under bushes. It needs urgent attention.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Philimore Close, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bleak Hill Lane, Plumstead

item.title: Dead squirrel in road, 16th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Bowness Road, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley

item.title: Several potholes in Norman Park car park plus fading line markings, 16th November
item.description:
The pothole at the entrance is causing damage to cars entering the park. Plus there are several areas where the surface is degrading. Plus, the lines marked for parking are virtually gone in some places. There is an issue with overhanging trees but I know they are being addressed by the athletics club on the 2nd December.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
